Description: Wall around car park, being rebuilt
Wall with inclined stonework, being restored

400 m of wall, alongside the South Dorset Ridgeway. Now rebuilt through the combined efforts of Dorset DSWA branch members, walling courses, DSWA Wallathon 2018, EuCAN conservation volunteers and the generous support of the Dorset AONB and David Foot Ltd
Wall alongside Sout Dorset Ridgeway, under repair
Wall alongside footpath (Hardy Way) between Langton Herring and Rodden Ridge
